title: Tapping ‘Mobile Ordering’ from cinncinatti reds page navigated user to Reds Lockers Food Ordering
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Cincinnati Red’s page in the Ballpark App
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps ‘Mobile Ordering’
custom_expected: THEN the user will be navigated to MOO Red’s Lockers food ordering page

title: Washington Nationals related json is not launched when user attempts to navigates to Reds
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Cincinnati Red’s page in the Ballpark App
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps ‘Mobile Ordering’
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be navigated to MOO Red’s Lockers food ordering page
AND the user will not see anything Washington Nationals related

title: ‘Reds’ logo displays on the header of Mobile food ordering
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Cincinnati Red’s page in the Ballpark App
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps ‘Mobile Ordering’
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be navigated to MOO Red’s Lockers food ordering page
AND the Red’s logo displays on the header

title: Correct payment types display
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has modified the config json for the red’s
custom_steps: WHEN the user add’s or removes payment method types (Visa, AMEX, etc)
custom_expected: THEN the corresponding payment types display properly in the UI

title: Home screen image can be changes by modifying json
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has modified the config json for the red’s
custom_steps:
WHEN the user changes the home icon URL to a different image URL
AND launches the app
custom_expected: THEN the appropriate image displays

title: eCash and be turned on/off via json
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has modified the config json for the red’s
custom_steps:
WHEN the user changes the eCash config to display eCash: False
AND launches the app
custom_expected:
THEN the eCash payment method does not display in the wallet
AND ‘use eCash’ is not available as an option in the home screen

title: Placeholder image displays when no home screen image
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Reds Mobile Food Ordering home screen (Reds MOO)
custom_steps: WHEN there is no image url in the json
custom_expected: THEN a placeholder image will display on the home screen

title: Placeholder image displays when invalid image url
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Reds Mobile Food Ordering home screen (Reds MOO)
custom_steps: WHEN there is an invalid image url in the json
custom_expected: THEN a placeholder image will display on the home screen

title: Help popover UI button displays as ‘Locker Fulfillment’
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the delivery method default is set to ‘locker-fulfillment’ in the json
AND the location.express_lane is set to ‘false'
AND the location.locker fulfillment is set to ‘false’ 
AND delivery_methods type is set to ‘locker_fulfillment’
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches the app
AND navigates to the ‘Browse Concessions’ screen
custom_expected: THEN the help popover buttons on the UI will display as ‘Locker Fulfillment’

title: Help popover UI button displays as ‘Locker Fulfillment’ when locations contains errors
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the delivery method default is set to ‘locker-fulfillment’ in the json
AND the location.express_lane Contains errors
AND the location.locker fulfillment contains errors 
AND delivery_methods type is set to ‘locker_fulfillment’
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches the app
AND navigates to the ‘Browse Concessions’ screen
custom_expected: THEN the help popover buttons on the UI will display as ‘Locker Fulfillment’

title: Help popover UI button displays as ‘Locker Fulfillment’ when delivery method is null
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the delivery method default is set to ‘“"’ in the json
AND the location.express_lane is set to ‘false'
AND the location.locker fulfillment is set to ‘true'
AND delivery_methods type is set to ‘locker_fulfillment’
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches the app
AND navigates to the ‘Browse Concessions’ screen
custom_expected: THEN the help popover buttons on the UI will display as ‘Locker Fulfillment’

title: Help popover UI button displays as ‘Locker Fulfillment’
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the delivery method default is set to ‘locker_fulfilment’ in the json
AND the location.express_lane is set to ’true'
AND the location.locker fulfillment is set to ‘false'
AND delivery_methods type is set to ‘locker_fulfillment’
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches the app
AND navigates to the ‘Browse Concessions’ screen
custom_expected: THEN the help popover buttons on the UI will display as ‘Locker Fulfillment

title: Help popover UI button does not display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the delivery method default is set to “" in the json
AND the location.express_lane is set to ’false'
AND the location.locker fulfillment is set to ‘false'
AND delivery_methods type is set to ‘locker_fulfillment’
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches the app
AND navigates to the ‘Browse Concessions’ screen
custom_expected: THEN the help popover button will NOT display

title: Help popover UI button displays as ‘Locker Fulfillment’
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the delivery method default is set to “" in the json
AND the location.express_lane is set to ’true'
AND the location.locker fulfillment is set to ’true'
AND delivery_methods type is set to ‘locker_fulfillment’
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches the app
AND navigates to the ‘Browse Concessions’ screen
custom_expected: THEN the help popover buttons on the UI will display as ‘Locker Fulfillment

title: Help popover UI button does not display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the delivery method default is set to “" in the json
AND the location.express_lane contains errors
AND the location.locker fulfillment contains errors
AND delivery_methods type is set to ‘locker_fulfillment’
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches the app
AND navigates to the ‘Browse Concessions’ screen
custom_expected: THEN the help popover button will NOT display

title: Help popover UI button does not display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the delivery method default is set to ‘locker_fulfilment’ in the json
AND the location.express_lane is set to ’false'
AND the location.locker fulfillment is set to ’true'
AND delivery_methods type is set to ‘locker_fulfillment’ 
AND contains errors
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches the app
AND navigates to the ‘Browse Concessions’ screen
custom_expected: THEN the help popover button will NOT display

title: Help popover UI button does not display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the delivery method default is set to ‘locker_fulfilment’ in the json
AND the location.express_lane is set to ’false'
AND the location.locker fulfillment is set to ’true'
AND delivery_methods type is null
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches the app
AND navigates to the ‘Browse Concessions’ screen
custom_expected: THEN the help popover button will NOT display

title: List of item modifiers available on item details screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the menu for a venue
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on an item
AND the user is navigated to the item selection screen
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a list of modifiers

title: User can select modifier
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the menu for a venue
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on an item
AND the user selects an item modifier
custom_expected: THEN the modifier will also be added to the cart

title: Amount total reflects correct item modifier amount
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the menu for a venue
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on an item
AND the user selects an item modifier
custom_expected:
THEN the modifier will also be added to the cart
AND the amount total will reflect the correct amount total in correspondence to item amount as well as item modifier amount

title: Modifiers are add/removed the price in the "add to cart" button price will update in real time
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the menu for a venue
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on an item
AND the user selects an item modifier 
AND the user is increasing or decreasing the item modifier
custom_expected: THEN the price (including the modifiers) will update in real time

title: Modifiers selected for the item displayer properly in the cart
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has added items to the cart 
AND these items include modifiers
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the cart
custom_expected:
THEN the user can see the added items
AND the modifiers properly reflect the modifiers added from the menu

title: Modifiers can be edited from cart and the cart screen updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has added items to the cart 
AND these items include modifiers
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the cart
AND the user attempts to edit the modifiers to increase/decrease
custom_expected: THEN the user can successfully edit the modifiers

title: ‘Being Prepared’ status displays on Order Card
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user places an order via Red’s mobile food ordering
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the homepage
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see that the ‘Being Prepared’ status displays on the order card

NOTE: in the json, fulfillment_status == created or delivering

title: 'Ready for Pickup' status displays on Order Card
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has placed an order via Red’s mobile food ordering
AND the venue has completed the preparation of the order
AND the order is ready for pickup
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the MOO home screen
custom_expected:
THEN the status on the order card will display as 'Ready for Pickup' 

Note: in the json, fulfillment_status == delivered

title: ‘Last Order' status displays on Order Card
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has placed an order via Red’s mobile food ordering
AND the venue has completed the preparation of the order
AND the user has picked up the order from the locker
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the MOO home screen
custom_expected:
THEN the status on the order card will display as ‘Last Order’ 

NOTE: in the json, fulfillment_status == Picked up

title: Add to cart button is available for a past order
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has placed an order via Red’s mobile food ordering
AND the venue has completed the preparation of the order
AND the user has picked up the order from the locker
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the MOO home screen
AND views the card for a past order
custom_expected: THEN there is button to add this past order to the cart

title: User can add past order to cart
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has placed an order via Red’s mobile food ordering
AND the venue has completed the preparation of the order
AND the user has picked up the order from the locker
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the MOO home screen
AND views the card for a past order
AND taps ‘Add to Cart'
custom_expected: THEN the past order is added to the cart

title: Order displays as 'Completed' on the Order history screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the order history screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing an order that has already been picked up
custom_expected: THEN 'Completed' displays as the status

title: ‘See Attendant’ status displays on Order Card in order history for cancelled order
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has placed an order via Red’s mobile food ordering
AND for some reason, the order has been cancelled
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the home screen
custom_expected:
THEN the status of the order card will display as ‘See Attendant’ 


note: moo_fulfillment_status_cancelled See Attendant

title: ‘See Attendant’ status displays on Order Card in order history for locked down order
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has placed an order via Red’s mobile food ordering
AND the order has been put in the locked down state: fulfillment status  = “locked_down”
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the home screen
custom_expected:
THEN the status of the order card will display as ‘See Attendant’ 

moo_fulfillment_status_locked_down	See Attendant

title: ‘See Attendant’ status displays on Order Card in order history for reclaimed order
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has placed an order via Red’s mobile food ordering
AND the order has been put in the locked down state: fulfillment status = “reclaimed”
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the home screen
custom_expected:
THEN the status of the order card will display as ‘See Attendant’ 

moo_fulfillment_status_reclaimed	See Attendant

title: Concession name displays on the home screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has previously placed an order via Red’s mobile food ordering
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the MOO home screen
AND there is an order card displaying on the home screen
custom_expected: THEN the concession name will display on the order card

title: Concession image displays on the home screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has previously placed an order via Red’s mobile food ordering
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the MOO home screen
AND there is an order card displaying on the home screen
custom_expected: THEN the concession image will display on the order card

title: Concession level/section displays on the home screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has previously placed an order via Red’s mobile food ordering
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the MOO home screen
AND there is an order card displaying on the home screen
custom_expected: THEN the concession level/section will display on the order card

title: Barcode displays on the Order Confirmation screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Red’s mobile food ordering 
AND the user has placed an order
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the order card to launch the order confirmation screen
custom_expected: THEN the Barcode will display

title: Pick Up Location displays on the Order Confirmation screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Red’s mobile food ordering 
AND the user has placed an order
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the order card to launch the order confirmation screen
custom_expected: THEN the Pick Up location will display

title: Locker Bank displays on the Order Confirmation screen once food is ready for pickup
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Red’s mobile food ordering 
AND the user has placed an order
AND the order is ready for pickup
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the order card to launch the order confirmation screen
custom_expected: THEN the Locker Bank will display

title: ‘Locker ?’ Help Popover button displays on the Order Confirmation screen if food is not ready for pickup
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Red’s mobile food ordering 
AND the user has placed an order
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the order card to launch the order confirmation screen
AND the order is not yet ready for pickup
custom_expected: THEN the locker help Popover button will display as ‘Locker ?’

title: Time ordered displays on the order confirmation screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Red’s mobile food ordering 
AND the user has placed an order
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the order card to launch the order confirmation screen
custom_expected: THEN the Time ordered will display

title: Status displays on the order confirmation screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Red’s mobile food ordering 
AND the user has placed an order
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the order card to launch the order confirmation screen
custom_expected: THEN the order status will display

title: Average wait time displays on the order confirmation screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Red’s mobile food ordering 
AND the user has placed an order
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the order card to launch the order confirmation screen
custom_expected: THEN the average wait time will display

title: Pickup code does not display under barcode placeholder when the order has not been yet delivered
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user places an order
AND the order has NOT been delivered to the lockers yet
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the barcode screen
custom_expected: THEN the pickup code under the barcode will not display

title: Display the placeholder image on barcode screen if "pickup_code" in the "fulfillment_locations" object is "null”
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the home screen screen
AND the  "pickup_code" in the "fulfillment_locations" object is "null”
in the MOO config json
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the order to launch the order confirmation screen
custom_expected: THEN a placeholder image will display on where the barcode should be

title: Display the Barcode image on barcode screen if "pickup_code" in the "fulfillment_locations" object has a value
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the home screen screen
AND the  "pickup_code" in the "fulfillment_locations" object has a value
 in the MOO config json
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the order to launch the order confirmation screen
custom_expected: THEN the barcode will display

title: Order confirmation screen refreshes every 120 seconds
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the order confirmation screen
custom_steps: WHEN 120 seconds passes after the previous refresh or launch
custom_expected: THEN the screen with auto refresh

title: Pickup code displays under barcode when status is delivered
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user places an order
AND the order has been delivered to the lockers making the order state to display as ‘delivered'
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the barcode screen
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the pickup code under the barcode

title: Display the Image of the concession if image available
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the browse concessions screen
custom_steps: WHEN there is an image associated to a location
custom_expected: THEN the image will display on the browse concessions screen

title: Display popover button is popover available
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the browse concessions screen
custom_steps: WHEN there is the help popover active in the json
custom_expected: THEN the help popover button will display on the browse concessions screen

title: Display the popover button if the “moo_popup_dismiss_button” has a valid value in the Help Popover config
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Browse Location screen
AND the  “moo_popup_dismiss_button” has a valid value in the MOO config json
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the row for the location
custom_expected: THEN the help popover button will display

title: Do not Display the popover button if the “moo_popup_dismiss_button” has null value
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Browse Location screen
AND the  “moo_popup_dismiss_button” has a null value in the MOO config json
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the row for the location
custom_expected: THEN the help popover button will not display

title: Phone number field is available in the cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in the cart
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the available fields
custom_expected: THEN the phone number field is available in the cart

title: App sends 11 digit number to Bypass even when 10 digit number is input
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the Phone Number field
AND enters their 10 digit number
AND places the order
custom_expected: THEN the app will send the full 11 digit number including the ‘1’ before area code to bypass (Verify through charles)

title: App sends 11 digit number to Bypass even 11 digit number is input
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the Phone Number field
AND enters their 11 digit number
AND places the order
custom_expected: THEN the app will send the full 11 digit number including the ‘1’ before area code to bypass (Verify through charles)

title: User places order which is created displays in trajectory
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user places an order
custom_steps: WHEN the user logs into trajectory
custom_expected: THEN the order will be available as ‘created’

title: ‘Delivery code’ is available in trajectory
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user places an order
custom_steps:
WHEN the user logs into trajectory
AND views the order
custom_expected: THEN the order will have a ‘delivery code’ available

title: ‘Pickup code’ is available in trajectory
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user places an order
custom_steps:
WHEN the user logs into trajectory
AND views the order
custom_expected: THEN the order will have a ‘pickup code’ available

title: User can enter delivery code into lockers and locker door will open
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user places an order
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the delivery code into the lockers 
AND presses the ‘#’ key
custom_expected: THEN the locker door will open

title: Order displays as fulfillment status ‘delivered’ UI string ‘Waiting for Pickup’ after entering delivery code and closing locker door
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user places an order
AND the user enters the delivery code into the lockers 
AND presses the ‘#’ key
AND the locker door will opens
custom_steps: WHEN the user closes the door
custom_expected:
THEN the order status on the App side will display as ‘Waiting for Pickup’
AND the fulfillment status in the orders json will display as ‘delivered'

title: User can enter pickup code into lockers and locker door will open
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user places an order
AND the order has already been delivered to the lockers (status ‘delivered’)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the pickup code into the lockers 
AND presses the ‘#’ key
custom_expected: THEN the locker door will open

title: Order displays as ‘Complete’ and fulfillment status ‘Pickedup’ after entering Pickup code and closing locker door
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user places an order
AND the order has already been delivered to the locker
AND the user enters the pickup code into the lockers 
AND presses the ‘#’ key
AND the locker door will opens
custom_steps: WHEN the user closes the door
custom_expected:
THEN the order status on the App side will display as ‘Complete’
AND the fulfillment status in the orders json will display as ‘pickedup'

title: Order status displays as ‘See attendant’ and fulfillment status as ‘lockeddown’ if locked down code is entered instead of delivery code
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user places an order
AND the user has not picked up the order yet
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the locked down code into the lockers 
AND presses the ‘#’ key
AND the locker door will opens
AND the user closes the door
custom_expected:
THEN the order status on the App side will display as ’see attendant’
AND the fulfillment status in the orders json will display as ‘lockeddown'

title: User sees order status as ‘see attendant’ and fulfillment status as ‘cancelled’ if user created order and cancels order via trajectory
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user places an order
AND the user has not been delivered yet
custom_steps:
WHEN the user logs into trajectory
AND cancels the order
custom_expected:
THEN the order status on the App side will display as ’see attendant’
AND the fulfillment status in the orders json will display as ‘cancelled’
AND the user will be issued a refund
